name: E-Commerce Platform - Full DDD
description: Complete domain-driven design for an e-commerce marketplace

inputs.domainDescription: An online marketplace platform that connects buyers and sellers. Sellers can list products with descriptions, images, and pricing. Buyers can browse products, add items to shopping cart, complete checkout, and track orders. The platform handles payment processing, inventory management, order fulfillment, and shipping coordination. Additional features include product reviews, seller ratings, customer support, and promotional campaigns.
